title: The Nets Dumped Steve Nash. Should It Have Been Kyrie Irving?
description: The star-loaded Nets have an awful record and parted ways with Coach Steve Nash. But a bigger problem with Kyrie Irving and his antisemitic social media post remains.
dc:creator: Kurt Streeter
media:credit: Michelle Farsi for The New York Times
media:description: Coach Steve Nash was let go Tuesday amid a disappointing and tumultuous start for the Nets.
